meanings.definition: The quality or state of being diffusive.
meanings.sent1: The diffusivenesses of the perfume filled the room with a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent2: The diffusivenesses of the light in the room created a warm and cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The diffusivenesses of the gossip around the office made everyone curious.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a diffusivenesses that touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The diffusivenesses of the music enveloped the audience in a wave of emotions.

meanings.definition: The act or process of diffusing or spreading out.
meanings.sent1: The diffusivenesses of the ink on the paper made the writing blurry.
meanings.sent2: The diffusivenesses of the scent from the bakery drew customers in.
meanings.sent3: The diffusivenesses of the paint on the canvas created a beautiful blend of colors.
meanings.sent4: The diffusivenesses of the news spread quickly throughout the town.
meanings.sent5: The diffusivenesses of the fog obscured the view of the mountains.
